member.name: T:Windows.Management.Deployment.Preview.ClassicAppManager
member.summary: A static class that is used to find installed classic desktop apps.

member.name: M:Windows.Management.Deployment.Preview.ClassicAppManager.FindInstalledApp(System.String)
member.summary: Finds and returns info for an installed classic desktop app.
member.param: The uninstall registry key for the app.

member.name: T:Windows.Management.Deployment.Preview.InstalledClassicAppInfo
member.summary: Provides display info for an installed classic desktop app.

member.name: P:Windows.Management.Deployment.Preview.InstalledClassicAppInfo.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name for an installed classic desktop app.
member.returns: The name of the app as a String that can be displayed.

member.name: P:Windows.Management.Deployment.Preview.InstalledClassicAppInfo.DisplayVersion
member.summary: Gets the display version for an installed classic desktop app.
member.returns: The version of the app as a String that can be displayed.
